general.gigTitle: develop and design wordpress website using elementor pro

sellerCard.oneLiner: Turning your vision into reality with design
sellerCard.description: Hey there, I'm Certified Ak, your go-to expert for WordPress and web design! With over 8 years of experience, I've worked with clients from different countries, completing more than 1000 projects and making over 800clients happy since 2018 — and still going strong. My mission? To build websites that don’t just function, but captivate. From squashing bugs to boosting SEO and speed, I’ve got you covered. Need to generate leads or run eye-catching email campaigns? Consider it handled. Let’s bring your digital vision to life. Reach out, and let’s make web magic happen!

description.content:
Are you Looking to clone, duplicate, copy, or customize any WordPress website? Here I am, As an experienced web designer and developer with over 9 years of experience, I'm here to help bring your dream website to life.


Whether you're looking to create an e-commerce, affiliate, blog, real estate, or restaurant website! I have the skills and expertise to make it happen.


My services include:


  • Duplicating/cloning/copying website designs
  • Creating personal, e-commerce, and blog sites
  • Customizing any site to your needs
  • Convert to WordPress from Figma, XD, PSD
  • Use Elementor to make the website fully Customizable
  • Fully responsive design
  • Adding or removing functions/features
  • Fixing any errors
  • Uploading content
  • Providing customization,
  • theme setup,
  • and additional features


Why Choose Me?


  • Guaranteed 100% quality satisfaction
  • 100% money-back guarantee
  • Lifetime support


Please contact me before placing your order to discuss your specific needs.


Thank you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you consult me before place and order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes definitely. I highly recommend you do this so that we can be sure that we are on the same page. I can review your website or your requirements and suggest my best package for your business moving forward.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see more samples of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yeah Absolutely, I have a huge portfolio of all my work. just send me a message and I would be happy to share them with you :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do we get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need to know as much as possible about you and your business. I will need access to your hosting account or existing WordPress website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would I be able to easily manage my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to easily add / update/delete / maintain your website from the admin panel without any programming skills. We will provide the username and password of the admin panel and show you how to do that.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be Mobile Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, it'll be responsive for all devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I provide free support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I'll offer you a 30-day free support that will include any basic changes to your store. You can also buy my maintenance gig for ongoing support.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support or maintenance after my web site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I offer on going support through messages (Q&A style) to help them manage your website. I can also offer custom maintenance packages to keep your website up to date and secure.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to buy Elementor Pro?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I have Pro Element and if you have elementor pro it's a plus.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does Premium theme and Plugins are included?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will use the Astra theme with Elementor. If there will be any premium plugin/theme required, you have to buy it, i design my site so you have no problem if you don't need theme.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also setup Affiliate/DropShipping Stores?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I have extensive experience with setting up affiliate/dropshipping woo commerce stores. I mostly use ALI EXPRESS, EBAY, AMAZON.

reviews.comment: It is and has always been a pleasure working with AK he has always helped me and been patient, supportive, and understanding with helping build my website for my business highly recommend his services

Certified Ak truly stands out in website development with remarkable ATTENTION TO DETAIL and professionalism. Working with them was a breeze; they are incredibly cooperative and responsive, ensuring everything was delivered on time and beyond expectations. Highly recommend this exceptional freelancer! 👏
I have a business page that needs to be built, and I am engaging him.

Certified Ak did a fantastic job on my website development! The professionalism  and their level of cooperation, prompt delivery, and quick responsiveness made the entire experience seamless. Highly recommended! 👍
